comments:
Hi,

I ran the Automated test suite [RELENG testSuite] for Eclipse 3.0 in Linux 
platform. I am getting the following failure. I have made installations 
properly.I could not understand where the problem is.

I have pasted the failure below.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
testChkpii Failure /home/anand/3.0test/eclipse-testing/test-
eclipse/eclipse/../../eclipse-SDK-3.0-linux-motif.zip: /builds/t: IOException 
unzipping Eclipse for chkpii 

junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: /home/anand/3.0test/eclipse-testing/test-
eclipse/eclipse/../../eclipse-SDK-3.0-linux-motif.zip: /builds/t: IOException 
unzipping Eclipse for chkpii
at org.eclipse.releng.tests.BuildTests.testChkpii(BuildTests.java:528)

Created an attachment (id=13644)
The test result is attached herewith.

Have attached the Test Result herewith for your perusal.

May I know what functionality is being tested by that test case ?

Thanks,
Ragav.

From my guess, the failure is caused because the directory /builds does not 
exist.  However this particular test can be ignored since the chkpii tool is 
not available publicly.
